I'm the Cloud Engineering Lead at ATC Africa, where I lead a community of passionate Cloud and DevOps engineers to achieve organizational goals. Equally, I serve as a DevOps mentor and teacher at Enforca Technologies, UK where I am mentoring a set of passionate DevOps engineers on building production-grade CI/CD clusters using the most modern and advanced tools. I'm passionate about how Applications scale to millions and billions of users without downtime, keeping track of SLIs, SLOs & SLAs, and ensuring the Confidentiality, Integrity, and Availability of Applications. I love sharing knowledge on linux, Bash, docker, terraform, Ansible, GCP, AWS, Azure, Jenkins, GitHub Actions, Kubernetes, ArgoCD and others. I create technical content (on my [Blog](https://medium.com/johntoby), [Newsletter](https://medium.com/johntoby), and [YouTube](https://www.youtube.com/c/johnidowu)), build useful [open-source projects](https://github.com/johntoby), speak at some meetups/conferences, build technical communities...
